content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) moving coal between chests

### Iron/Copper Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) smelting ore
- Burner inserter at (-25.5,-58.5) moving plates to chest
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) storing iron/copper plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-57 to -60)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Collection chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Burner inserters at (-7.5,-56.5), (-6.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-56.5) moving ore
- Transport belt system connecting the mining area

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input inserters and chests at (0.5,-1.5), (2.5,-1.5), (4.5,-1.5), (6.5,-1.5)
- Output inserters and chests at (0.5,1.5), (2.5,1.5), (4.5,1.5), (6.5,1.5)
- Transport belt system for material movement

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles providing power distribution

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract from invalid positions
- Ensure the target position contains the resource you're trying to extract
- Verify the position coordinates are correct before attempting extraction

### Errors related to chest capacity
- Monitor chest capacity at (-5.5,-55.5) and empty when full to prevent mining stoppage
- Consider adding more storage or faster item removal systems

### Power system errors
- Ensure boiler has fuel to generate steam
- Verify pipe connections are correct for proper fluid flow

### Mining operation errors
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain continuous operation
- Monitor and refuel burner inserters to maintain material flow
